```py
>>> from io import StringIO
>>> text = StringIO("1312 foo\n1534  bar\n444   qux") 
```

```py
>>> regexp = r"(\d+)\s+(...)"  # match [digits, whitespace, anything]
>>> output = np.fromregex(text, regexp,
...                       [('num', np.int64), ('key', 'S3')])
>>> output
array([(1312, b'foo'), (1534, b'bar'), ( 444, b'qux')],
 dtype=[('num', '<i8'), ('key', 'S3')])
>>> output['num']
array([1312, 1534,  444]) 
```
